Player History
Traded from Chicago (N) to Philadelphia on 5/1/2013 (Going to CHC: P Roy Halladay, C Andrew Knapp. Going to PHI: LF Shawon Dunston Jr., 1B Daniel Vogelbach)...
Injured on 7/20/2013 with a Pulled Hip Muscle, out for 6 days...
Injured on 6/28/2015 with a Broken Finger, out for 3 weeks...

Was claimed off waivers by Washington on 6/20/2017.
Was claimed off waivers by New York (A) on 7/30/2017.
Injured on 7/31/2020 with a Stiff Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,221,429 through salary arbitration...

Won Gold Glove at Leftfield in 2021...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,200,000 through salary arbitration...

1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,200,000 through salary arbitration...
10/24/2023: Signed a contract extension with New York (A), $2,210,000 per year, for 2 years.
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/16/2026 to a 4-year deal worth $5,450,000 per year...
Traded from Cleveland to Detroit on 2/5/2027 (Going to DET: LF Shawon Dunston Jr., C Nathan Landy. Going to CLE: RF Rey Rodarte)...
